message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You were too generous, now it's my turn to make a better offer!
I'll give you a better deal, but I'm not going to give away too much!

I'll give you a slightly bigger share, but I'm not going to give away too much more!
I'll take a big share, but I'll leave you with a tiny bit, don't expect much more!
I'll give you a slightly bigger share, but I'm not going to get left with nothing!
